content.text: Match ends, Chelsea 5, Stoke City 0.
Second Half ends, Chelsea 5, Stoke City 0.
Attempt missed. Michy Batshuayi (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Pedro.
Goal!  Chelsea 5, Stoke City 0. Davide Zappacosta (Chelsea) left footed shot from outside the box to the bottom right corner.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Kevin Wimmer.
Foul by Michy Batshuayi (Chelsea).
Kevin Wimmer (Stoke City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt saved. Pedro (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Marcos Alonso.
Substitution, Stoke City. Eric Maxim Choupo-Moting replaces Charlie Adam.
Willian (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Charlie Adam (Stoke City).
Attempt blocked. Pedro (Chelsea) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Davide Zappacosta with a cross.
Tiemoué Bakayoko (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Julien Ngoy (Stoke City).
Hand ball by Pedro (Chelsea).
Foul by Tiemoué Bakayoko (Chelsea).
Charlie Adam (Stoke City) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Offside, Chelsea. Willian tries a through ball, but Pedro is caught offside.
Goal!  Chelsea 4, Stoke City 0. Willian (Chelsea) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom left corner.
Penalty Chelsea. Willian draws a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty conceded by Geoff Cameron (Stoke City) after a foul in the penalty area.
Substitution, Chelsea. Michy Batshuayi replaces Álvaro Morata.
Substitution, Stoke City. Julien Ngoy replaces Ibrahim Afellay.
Attempt missed. Pedro (Chelsea) left footed shot from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Willian with a cross.
Attempt saved. Willian (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Tiemoué Bakayoko.
Offside, Stoke City. Charlie Adam tries a through ball, but Saido Berahino is caught offside.
Substitution, Chelsea. Tiemoué Bakayoko replaces N'Golo Kanté.
Foul by Davide Zappacosta (Chelsea).
Ramadan Sobhi (Stoke City) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Attempt saved. Pedro (Chelsea) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Willian with a cross.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Jack Butland.
Attempt saved. Álvaro Morata (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Willian with a through ball.
Substitution, Chelsea. Davide Zappacosta replaces Victor Moses.
Attempt missed. Pedro (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Marcos Alonso.
Marcos Alonso (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Mame Biram Diouf (Stoke City).
Pedro (Chelsea) is shown the yellow card.
Pedro (Chelsea) has gone down, but that's a dive.
Attempt saved. Saido Berahino (Stoke City) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Charlie Adam with a through ball.
Daniel Drinkwater (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Ramadan Sobhi (Stoke City).
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Kevin Wimmer.
Second Half begins Chelsea 3, Stoke City 0.
First Half ends, Chelsea 3, Stoke City 0.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Mame Biram Diouf.
Attempt missed. Pedro (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is too high.
Pedro (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Mame Biram Diouf (Stoke City).
Offside, Chelsea. Daniel Drinkwater tries a through ball, but Victor Moses is caught offside.
Hand ball by Mame Biram Diouf (Stoke City).
Offside, Chelsea. Gary Cahill tries a through ball, but Álvaro Morata is caught offside.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Antonio Rüdiger (Chelsea) because of an injury.
Attempt missed. César Azpilicueta (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Pedro.
Attempt saved. Willian (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Pedro.
Mame Biram Diouf (Stoke City) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Álvaro Morata (Chelsea) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Mame Biram Diouf (Stoke City).
Goal!  Chelsea 3, Stoke City 0. Pedro (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Willian.
Attempt saved. Pedro (Chelsea) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Álvaro Morata.
Offside, Stoke City. Darren Fletcher tries a through ball, but Mame Biram Diouf is caught offside.
Álvaro Morata (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Kevin Wimmer (Stoke City).
Attempt missed. Daniel Drinkwater (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is too high following a corner.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Kevin Wimmer.
Attempt saved. Álvaro Morata (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Willian.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Kevin Wimmer.
Attempt missed. Álvaro Morata (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Marcos Alonso.
Goal!  Chelsea 2, Stoke City 0. Daniel Drinkwater (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box to the top right corner.
Attempt blocked. Willian (Chelsea) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Álvaro Morata.
Goal!  Chelsea 1, Stoke City 0. Antonio Rüdiger (Chelsea) header from very close range to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Willian with a cross following a set piece situation.
Victor Moses (Chelsea) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Ramadan Sobhi (Stoke City).
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Geoff Cameron.
First Half begins.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
